ticket.tag: auto_link helper patch text_helper view view_helper
ticket.title: auto_link helper fails to parse some URLs with colons
ticket.original-body:
Looks like this issue was partially fixed 2 years ago (http://dev.rubyonrails.org/changeset/6005), but it still fails on URLs like the following:
https://www.google.com/doku.php?id=gps:resource:scs:start
The difference between the link above and the one provided in the test_helper_test.rb is that the colons occur after the query param (?). The current test only tests colons in URLs without query params:
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wikipedia:Today%27s_featured_picture_%28animation%29/January_20%2C_2007

version.title: auto_link helper fails to parse some URLs with colons

version.body:
heh... looks like the sample URL above got munged by lighthouse (possibly the same bug I'm reporting). Here's the example in a pastie:
http://pastie.org/309204
version.body-html:

http://pastie.org/309204
version.title: auto_link helper fails to parse some URLs with colons

version.body: Fixed in attached patch... very simple fix. Includes change to test.
version.body-html: Fixed in attached patch... very simple fix. Includes change to test.
